entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Too much spacing between two rows with a FlexLayout on Android. #10698
  • Background is not recognized or is not accessible - breaks XAML Hot Reload #10696
  • RadioButton content not aligned to the ellipse on Windows (work on Android) #10694
  • Build MAUI library targeting .NET6 should have a Platforms folder (like for Windows, Android, iOS, Tizen) #10689
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes after starting creating a file new project for MAUI #10688
  • Japanese Hiragana to Kanji converting not works in Searchbar Android #10683
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can't add Map Pins #10180
  • Read SMS in MAUI (on Android / iOS) #10217
    Backlog
  • Random Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views. #10618
  • What can i say #10682
  • .gitignore / "obj" folder corrupt program #10685
  • How can I troubleshoot why my android device stops appearing in the VS 2022 list of 'Android Local Devices' #10548

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't use the main thread for networking #10697
    7.0
  • [net6] Some fixes for tests #10695
  • Add guidance how to test code documentation #10692
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22513.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22514.1 #10690
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tests] Ignore tests runs for Core/Controls/Blazor on 12.4 and Android API25 #10693
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10636
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10681
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix WinAppSDK 12 Additional resources keys #10680
    platform/windows 🪟

Updated

  • Revert "[Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button" #10664
  • Update to WinAppSDK 1.2 #10678
  • [Android] Fix Frame opacity #10672
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • [Core] Changes disposing items in CollectionView #10590
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Set data context on MauiDoneAccessoryView. #10677
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
